website_summaries.verdict: Fill these unique waffle bowls with your favorite fruit, sweet, or savory fillings – or try your hand at chicken and waffles!
pros: Fill with fruit, syrup, sausage, or whipped cream
Works for cornbread bowls for chili and brownie bowls for ice cream
cons: Latch that keeps the lid shut breaks relatively easily, so open and close gently

website_summaries.verdict: A quality-made waffle bowl maker that produces perfect waffles every time.
pros: Right out of the box, we could tell the Presto is made well
It produces high-quality waffles and has no issues taking on other ingredients like potato, brownie, cookie, or cornbread bowls
We're impressed with the size of the bowl as well
Just one bowl, depending on the toppings you chose, would be the perfect portion for the average person
The cook time per waffle was roughly 2 to 3 minutes
cons: The Presto only makes one bowl at a time, and the waffles tend to get soggy if you wait too long

website_summaries.verdict: A fun appliance that makes thick, fluffy waffles and equally decent waffle bowls, taco bowls, and breads.
pros: Easy to use – simply add batter and let the machine do its magic
You can use store- bought mixes or the recipes included
Non-stick plates work well and cleaning is a breeze
cons: Finished bowls are smaller than you might anticipate
Bowls don't have a flat bottom and may need to rest in a bowl to keep them from falling over

website_summaries.verdict: At 4" deep, these waffle bowls will hold all your favorite flavors and toppings.
pros: Nonstick grids for easy waffle bowl removal and fast cleanup
Can fit 3/4 cup to 1 cup of ice cream in each bowl
Can use to make other sweet or savory food bowls, too
cons: Latch breaks easily so open and close with care

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun to use, and lots of possible fillings
customer_reviews.text: Fun! We've done all sorts of fillings, from scrambled eggs to chicken and gravy to ice cream. The waffles come out consistently cooked, they release decently (we also spray it, though), and look great. I almost want to get another one so my husband and I can eat at the same time, but it cooks quickly enough it's not a problem. Has handled a fair bit of use and feels like it'll keep going, but I'll update if anything hinky pops up. Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - It's an Amazon program where many things you buy every day will generate a small donation to the charity of your choice. Read about it here:
customer_reviews.author: 🌈 KT

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: This gets used multiple times a week. The waffle bowls are great with yogurt and fruit or whipped cream and honey. We have used it to cook cinnamon buns, puff pastry, pizza dough, and biscuits. We use parchment paper as a lining to sandwich the sweet breads in between so they do not burn. Everything that comes out of this thing taste delicious.
customer_reviews.author: N. Theodosiou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family night
customer_reviews.text: This was so fun and easy to use. Easy clean up. It heats up quickly. I didn't have any issues with the waffle sticking. I used my phone as a timer set at 3 minutes and they came out perfect. The entire family loves this thing. They enjoyed the waffles. I put berries and whip cream in them bowl. We've also made ice cream sundaes with them.
customer_reviews.author: Funshopper2006

customer_reviews.title: No temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Received this product full of fingerprints all over the waffle makes, box all smashed up... didn’t seems too professional to send a open box or returned product as if it was new! Not cool. But this is so cheap that I don’t really want to have to deal with this further by sending it back. Otherwise it seems strong build but you cannot control the temperature. It doesn’t cook the waffle evenly so you will see the bottom way more cooked. Tried it a few times and put it away. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Doe

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept and size
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept and size. The first waffles that I made, using the recipe included, came out hard as a rock when left in long enough to get golden brown. Nothing like the Belgian waffles I produce from my Waring waffle maker, so now am working on the recipe, trying to get an airier, softer batter. This novelty item may or may not work out, but the low price makes it worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: CB in LA

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that I stumbled upon on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Dear Presto, you already make one of my favorite products, the Presto Heat Dish. And I see that your quality products continue with the waffle bowl maker. I bought this for my grandkids to use at my house and I seem to like it just as much as they do. Makes excellent waffle bowls, ice cream bowls and my grandson uses it to make an ice cream taco. I enjoy my waffles with pecans and no longer have to make the trek to The Waffle House to have my favorite waffle. They are are also great just to tear apart and dip in real maple syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Never reached cooking temp
customer_reviews.text: Terrible gift idea, I bought this for my grandmother who absolutely loves making a hot breakfast and she finally opened this last week after having it since Christmas and told me that it stop working, I went to see the problem and it never gets to temperature. To think I was so excited about this item only to find out it was a waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: On Sunday, July 8 it quit working completely. ...
customer_reviews.text: On Sunday, July 8 it quit working completely. Didn't last even last 2 months! I also noticed a week or so earlier that is was starting to burn and thought this my because I left it in too long. Nope! Burned no matter what. Presto 03500 Belgian Bowl Waffle Maker, Black ... National Presto Industries, Inc.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Kewlest small appliance I own! BUY ONE even if you don't have kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT!!!! I didn't buy it to make waffles. I'm using it to make flour and corn tortilla bowls. IT WORKS FANTASTIC for the tortillas!!! Plan to try spring roll and egg roll wrappers. When berries come into season, I will make the Belgian waffle bowls for ice cream, berries, and whipped cream YUUUUMMMMMM! Can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen buy I have made in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to provide something fun for my grandchildren, to fill with eggs or even ice cream. I had no idea how great this was going to be for my own meals. Not only are the bowls great freshly made, they might even be a little bit better after they’ve been frozen and reheated! Each waffle bowl is the size of a cereal bowl. If you were thinking of buying a cute specialty waffle maker, this should be first on your list!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki K. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: It works with low-carb mix, too!
customer_reviews.text: Used this first day with Paleo low-carb pancake/waffle mix -works great! Instead of trying to make biscuits, we filled this waffle bowl with sausage gravy (made with butter, coconut flour, low-sufar milk and chopped up turkey sausage links). Our diabetic gift recipient was ecstatic! Could have crisped it a bit more in the oven, but unnecessary for this recipe. Waffle bowls are a hit at our house! Looking forward to using this maker with lowered carb tortillas, sugar-free brownie mix, and 647 bread to adapt other favorite recipes to add fun food that still meets special dietary needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Chik

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Bought on a whim on Prime Day. LOVE LOVE LOVE it! We have used it for regular waffle bowls, cornbread waffle bowls (for serving taco salad), chocolate chip waffles (that we cut-up and eat like warm cookies). Can't wait to try other recipes. It is sort of a pain to clean (the bowls cannot be removed) - but we used disinfecting wipes like you'd us on your counters), and then rinsed a little and wiped with paper towel - and that worked fine. Be careful not to use too much batter - the spill-over is the hardest part to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes beautiful waffle bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Saw a short video of this waffle maker and had to have one. Took it right out of the box and tested it. Once you learn how much to fill the bowl to prevent spill-over, it makes beautiful waffle bowls, evenly browned and just perfect for desserts, fruit, or just waffles and syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Tenore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean up. Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool! The first thing I did with it when I got it was to make waffle bowls filled with scrambled eggs, bacon and cheese. My family devoured them! Not a crumb left! It was so easy to make them and keep them warm and crisp in the oven as I finished the eggs and bacon and assembled the bowls. The waffle maker works like a charm! No oil or non-stick spray needed and it wipes clean with wet cloth. Love it!! Cant wait to make waffle cone bowls and serve them with ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Add oil to the mix
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice, both with the same pancake mix. The first time I forgot to add a couple of tablespoons of oil. They stuck a little and were a touch soggy. I remembered it the second time and they were awesome - crispy and no stick. I haven't had any issues with it overflowing, but that would be messy, so take care to work your way up filling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Migliore

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, only problem is I ordered a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, only problem is I ordered a new one and the one I received seems to be used. It came with waffle batter stains. Not sure what Amazon is trying to pull here, but the hassle of returning it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: chris hightower

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this waffle bowl maker twice and both came of my dishes came out pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: and then no matter what I did the waffles started sticking terribly. Will not come out at all
customer_reviews.text: Mine worked for about six months, and then no matter what I did the waffles started sticking terribly. Will not come out at all. I loved it at first. I don’t really know what went wrong. I wish I could say that this lasts longer than 6 months. I’m using the exact same recipe so I know it’s not me! I’m sad we had to break up.
customer_reviews.author: A girl just trying to help

customer_reviews.title: The non-stick surface started to come out after less than 10 times of use.
customer_reviews.text: I love having different kinds of waffles every weekend. This waffle maker is a cute idea, I can put ice cream, fruits or even eggs in the waffle bowl. It can be better by having temperature adjustments, but not a big deal in my opinion. I don't like that it is difficult to clean. The non-stick surface started to come out after less than 10 times of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: It's easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: This is so much more than a waffle maker, I've made corn bread bowls, biscuit bowls, cookie bowls. It's easy and fast. I use it every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Furby's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect maker & waffle bowls
customer_reviews.text: We have two other Presto cookware pieces (electric griddle and flip Belgian waffle iron), so when we wanted a waffle bowl maker I searched and found this. Do we NEED it? Of course not. Is it a great, fun gadget? Heck yes. Easy to use (I filled to just below the full-line for the ideal shape), zero mess/clean-up, makes fun and yummy bowls. This morning's (half whole wheat and oatmeal) were filled with chopped bananas and a tiny 'bonk' of fresh vanilla whipped cream. It's the little things that help make life fun these crazy days...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: OmNomNomNom!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and I’m so glad I did! It has multiple recipes for the batter or you can use regular batter. He’s made breakfast in it with eggs, sausage, and bacon, and a fruit bowl with whip cream! It’s so easy to use and extremely versatile. We’re gonna make a Southwestern skillet next with a cornbread batter and gravy. I can’t wait!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Cooks more then waffles.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. We are cooking all kinds of things in this that are supper healthy. Great activity for the whole family. When cooking heavily fruity recipes we unplug it often to cut the intensity of heat so it won't burn, cool, then cook longer. Mashed banana with one spoonful of waffle mix is the family favorite. I suggest having several different irons because cooking one real waffle can take five minutes. We collect the different griddle designs. The bowel is an interesting addition. Turkey bacon cooked like an x then covered in waffle batter is the second most requested for this design. Haven't used it as a bowl yet as we keep eating them before we test the functionality!
customer_reviews.author: greatwhitejaws

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I only received this less than a week ago, and have already used a few times. I love it, It works like a charm. It's very easy to use, and very easy to clean up. I use very little non stick spray, and have had no problems with it. It is a very good product. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lil mama

customer_reviews.title: Works great & reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and in good order, and is as pictured; arrived in retail packaging, but is well protected inside; easy to use & makes great waffle bowls; my only gripe is that the bottom of the waffle bowl is somewhat rounded rather than flat so it wobbles a bit, but other than that ordering, paying, making & eating are a thoroughly enjoyable experience; can also make cake bowls & bread bowls according to the instructions though I haven't tried those yet
customer_reviews.author: zzooti

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Waffle bowls. And hashed potatoe bowls. The Presto 03500 Belgian Bowl Waffle Bowl makes em' fast and clean up is a breeze. We've eaten the bowls with fruit, chili, whipped cream, ice cream, peanut butter and honey, maple syrup, BBQ brisket, and scrambled eggs w/bacon. Getting the correct amount of batter is a challenge. Bowls are either slightly to big or small. But they get eaten up just the same, also good thickness, cooks fast, hard to burn even if you are not paying perfect attention.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Beat waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: My kids saw this and begged me to buy it. I hate waffle makers because they are always messy and hard to clean. I figured this would be the same. Nope! There was zero mess! This nonstick waffle maker is actually nonstick. Not s drop if batter stuck. My kids thought these waffle bowls were soooo good and fun! I put fruit and whip cream in theirs, my husband did butter and syrup, and I did eggs. There’s so many fun things to do with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Presto 035000
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered with no package only in the retail box, which is the reason for giving four stars. This is strange for me and unusual for Amazon delivery service. Fast delivery with my Prime membership. Update: The hinge got broke just after first use. Attached is picture of broken piece. Item is going for replace. Hope the new one to lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: H. Nikolova

customer_reviews.title: Fun little addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This little waffle maker is wonderful! I have another regular waffle maker and it is difficult to clean, but this one really does not get dirty. I love how compact it is, yet one waffle bowl is really all each person needs. They cook very quickly and I just put them in the oven in warm while the rest cook. I have not tried any other recipes expect regular waffles, but I am planning on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to know this product would not be discreetly packaged; it arrived at my door screaming "Take me! I'm a waffle bowl maker!" It seems to work okay according to the instructions, but there was definitely no burn off at first use. It also appeared to be unboxed and repackaged. On the plus side, so far, it does seem to work as described.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOO MUCH FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found the deal online, so I bought it just to try it out, knowing I could send it back if it didn't work. I used a half cup each time, but next time I will use a little less. It's really easy to see if they are ready or not , and I used other reviewer's advice about using a glove to open it. They are awesome! So much fun! I cannot wait to play around with it some more. And Amazon's policy is so good, that if it breaks on a second use (like some reviewers state) then I will send it back. But it so easy, and so much fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Non stick easily comes off.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it should and makes beautiful waffle bowls but the non stick coating comes off very easily. After first getting it and using it the lip where the closing mechanism latches has scratched off some of the enamel already.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: It worked two times now light won't even come on
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this product. Today was the second time for me to use it. I was trying to make waffle cone bowls. The first one burned black. The second one was good. But with the third one, I left it in for about 5 minutes and it was still partially raw. Now, the light won't come on. Not pleased at all!
customer_reviews.author: TerSw

customer_reviews.title: Makes food fun
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool gadget to make fun food. I saw some pictures of creative food bowl ideas which convinced me to buy it. I think my kids will enjoy it. It is easy to use and cooks waffles in about three minutes. The waffles come out really easy which makes the iron easy to wipe clean. I did accidentally make a scratch on the non stick part of my waffle iron without much pressure when using a metal fork once, so just be extra careful. The waffles were delicious.
customer_reviews.author: B.mara

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised at this waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this waffle maker with intent to make hashbrown bowls, taco bowls from flour tortillas, as well as waffles. Perfect waffles of all varieties! Hashbrown bowl good but not pretty, lol. It DID make a nice tortilla bowl if you spray tortilla with oil first. Nice presentation for bowls..add any filling for a nice change up. I love it. Wish it had a double bowl, but it cooks bowls so quickly, not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Love the versatility of it and the plate ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Love the versatility of it and the plate presentation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -It is easy to clean (Just wipe it with a paper towel just after you are done using it). -Does not take up a lot of counter real estate. The Bad: -I would recommend a quick shot of PAM (or similar) before use to keep the bowl from sticking. -I wish a measuring device was included for the proper amount of batter as I either over do it or don't put enough in. The Ugly: -I have not found one that makes larger bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bean

customer_reviews.title: Go with a regular waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Although this works as advertised we have used it a lot less than we expected. Have a regular waffle maker at home and bought this for my sister while we visited for a week. Its much bulkier than a regular waffle maker, you can't make smaller waffles in this thing like you would in a normal waffle maker, and the value of a waffle cup is less than we thought it would be. Happier with a regular waffle with fruit on top rather than a waffle bowl.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Waffle bowl is too soft
customer_reviews.text: This maker does not have good temperature control. It does not create crisp waffle bowl. When we followed the instruction, all the waffle either turn brown or too soft and thick. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: waffle bowl
customer_reviews.text: I dont think there has been a morning where we haven't used this waffle bowl maker. We love it over here. So far we have place breakfast eggs and bacon on the inside of it. This weekend we are going to try ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Jamili Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Love this waffle bowl maker
customer_reviews.text: Although I've only used this waffle bowl maker twice, I've cranked out 3 dozen waffle bowls! So easy to use! Just pour your batter to the line, close and give it about 4 minutes. Open the lid and use a fork to gently lift your waffle out! Easy to clean too! Nothing stuck inside and was was easy to wipe down. The waffles came out great. Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside! Looking forward to using some other mixes like cake batter and hash browns!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: but the end result is thicker kinda like an average pancake
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be able to make thinner waffles for ice cream, but the end result is thicker kinda like an average pancake. Maybe if I spent more time researching how to make crispier dough it would work out, but as-is it is not exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A Lee

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is awesome and easy to use, use oven mitt to open. The problem with my order was I ordered the Dash waffle maker for $7.99 plus tax and did not check my email or take a pic of my order for proof and I was sent this one that was 21.99 instead and charged that much. I have no idea how this happened nor does amazon but I am keeping this one, too much trouble to send back. I would’ve bought a double waffle maker for more if I had known, lesson learned. I will be taking a pic of my order for future orders.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: No sign to remind you when waffle is ready.
customer_reviews.text: I love the item designing idea, but it is easy to get confused on how to operate. Machine started to heat up right after plug in, no turn on click. The most confused part is that there is no sign to remind you when the job is done and when the waffle is ready, the light went on and off and you just do not know when it is ready. I got ones are burned, and other ones are too soft. Still try to work with it, but if not, I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sailing International Trading LLC

customer_reviews.title: Unique product that works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. I was looking for a waffle maker and was going to buy a traditional one until I ran across this little guy. It works great and I find I use it more than a regular waffle maker. The bowls are cool and I find I actually use it more like a pita pocket. I enjoy this product so much that I bought two more to give to my mother and sister for Mother’s Day. Great product and price!
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: My breakfast looks gourmet
customer_reviews.text: I love this waffle maker, oatmeal bowls are super cool looking to impress my grandkids ,excellent for coconut flour bowls .paleo waffles are my favorites
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fun waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waffle maker on a lark. It turns out that it works very well and is a lot of fun to use. My wife and I have made breakfast by putting eggs in the waffle, by just eating it with butter and syrup and we are looking forward to trying ice cream in it!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Acura

customer_reviews.title: and it made the perfect waffles!
customer_reviews.text: I follow the instructions, and it made the perfect waffles!!! I love it when a product does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cook twice to get waffle to stay up
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to make waffle bowls for some time and this works pretty well. The reason it gets 4 and not 5 stars is because if you want the made waffle bowl to stay upright and not flatten out quickly. It is necessary to run it through the cooking timer twice. Then they stand wonderfully and dont flatten out like a fat tortilla.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Looked used and few parts fell off
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to use this during my family gathering this coming weekend. I was so ready that I went ahead and bought the ready to use batter from my local supper market. It arrived today; I started opening it and as soon as I took it our of the box, the red light cover fell off (looked broken/used). The styrofoam around the product was dirty and used as well. I am very disappointed and couldn't believe that I paid closed to 30 bucks for this. I wish this could be fixed and explained by Amazon. My plan for the weekend (making chicken filled waffles is not going to happen :(
customer_reviews.author: Maya B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stop with just waffles. Have some fun and play with it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun to use, has a small footprint, very easy to clean, very deep imprint depending upon the batter thickness. I’ve made regular style waffle boats, stuffed with bacon and cheese bits, pre-made tortilla shells and my favorite...mashed potato waffle bowl to hold my homemade curry wursts and sauce. I use the waffle maker both at home and at a friends German Imbus/restaurant to surprise the patrons. Confuses the German patrons when their currywurst is in a Kartoffel Waffel Boot nicht Pommes frites.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.F. Houpt II, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Great deal....
customer_reviews.text: I was truly amazed when this worked as well as it did. Alot if gadgets never work as stated but everytime I have used it, no matter the recipe it came out perfect. There are many different brands for this but for less then 20 bucks its truly a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Webber

customer_reviews.title: Yummy perfect
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect! It's so nice being able to wake up and make a waffle bowl for my wife, and a girlfriend. We were able to fill it with strawberries and other fruit. Now we're moving on to doing waffle bowl and fried chicken. The only thing I wish is if I could buy another one at the sale price. It was recently on sale, but Amazon will not let me buy one. I actually wanted to buy it as a gift and give to somebody
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a great banana spit with the edible bowl
customer_reviews.text: I use a Italian wafer cookie mix and then make the bowl. fill it with ice cream , cut bananas and top it with whip cream. a great banana spit with the edible bowl. GREAT love it.
customer_reviews.author: christina haxton

customer_reviews.title: Daughter always posts pics of good food she made in this :-)
customer_reviews.text: My grown daughter wanted this but I couldn't find it in our local retail stores. Great price here on Amazon and worked great. Thanks for helping a mom out with a hard to shop for daughter present :-)
customer_reviews.author: V. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like waffles....
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression from other reviews I would be able to do more than just waffles (I don’t even like waffles) but I tried and it really is a waffle maker, forget cookies they burnt in order to fully cook... Corn bread bowls a little crisp but nasty and soggy after adding chili. I did t even get to try cake mix, cheese or tortillas I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Fun To Use!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Did I really need it? Well, no. Sometimes though, you just want to have a little fun with your food, and this is the bomb! You can actually turn tator tots into a solid and completely bowl shape. Who’d have thought? Only grown up kids at my house, but we all enjoy cooking and this little gadget definitely puts some fun back into it. I think regular aged children would just love it too.
customer_reviews.author: MsJill

customer_reviews.title: Puts a new spin on meals. :-)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean! I've made waffle breakfast bowls and biscuit bowls. Cooking time is fast!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Neat little machine
customer_reviews.text: One waffle is actually quite filling since it’s pretty thick. Does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: natural health

customer_reviews.title: Nice waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Love the little waffle baskets, I saw many ideas but I always end up eating them hot right out the waffle maker. Maybe one day I will put ice cream or omelet or fruit salad in them, even chili, one day!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carter

customer_reviews.title: If you think you need this, you’re right.
customer_reviews.text: Omg... we are so happy with this. We have made breakfast and dessert with it. Our first experiment we made some sausage and added it into scrambled eggs with cheese. Perfect in the waffle bowl. It’s our current favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase! Better than the grill :)
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I've only tried with waffle mix. Results are delicious... sturdy waffle bowl that makes for a savory taco-ish shell without worry of leaks. And unlike George Foreman grills, this is super-easy to clean up. It's also nice that it doesn't have a big footprint - so it's easy to store in the kitchen. Looking forward to trying with tater tots and meats.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Ching

customer_reviews.title: WE love it!
customer_reviews.text: My little daughter is the one that prepare the mix and use this Waffle Maker... WE love it!!! Great breakfast with yummy waffles every Saturday and Sunday. Easy to use. Easy to clean! Now we eat more waffles as we can filled them up with any kind of fruit, eggs, ice cream... to be continue!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my dad (who loves to make waffles) and he's had so much fun with this! He's tried regular waffle bowls, cornbread bowls, brownie bowls and funnel cake bowls! All with great success!! This is a wonderful product, comes with recipes and was the perfect Father's day gift!. He's shared his culinary creations, so we're all happy that he loves his waffle bowl maker!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for healthy choices.
customer_reviews.text: We are all about healthy choices. We made waffle bowls and gave the grandchildren a choice of fillings. Yogurt, bananas, all kinds of fresh fruit. But not without a dab of whipped cream on top. The grandkids love it when come overnight. The waffle bowls were a win, win!
customer_reviews.author: james Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the fun of it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the fun of it. Works very well. The grandkids like it. We use if for breakfast putting scrambled eggs in it and also for deserts with ice cream inside. Totally unnecessary but a nice novelty item.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJoe56

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little waffle maker. Thoroughly cooks pancake batter quickly. Doesn't stick. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today and we already used it several times. I made a a nice size waffle bowl. It fits nicely on the counter. The instructions are simple and so are the recipes. In 3 minutes you have a delicious waffle bowl. There are recipes for soup bowls and stuff. Looking forward to trying out some different things.
customer_reviews.author: lauren lincoln

customer_reviews.title: meh, broke second time we used it!!
customer_reviews.text: works as expected, with waffle and brownies... Second time we used this, the "lock tab" broke... Shot across the room!! If the unit did not BREAK, I would have given 4/5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiddtrek

customer_reviews.title: Great for a waffle bar buffet
customer_reviews.text: I bought the waffle bowl maker to use at a family holiday waffle bar buffet. We loved it! So easy to use and we love that you can add your fillings with out spilling and it’s delicious .
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: Belgian bowl waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Used one and burnt out the second time as it was warming. Not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Dave Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this product has exceeded my expectations. It is absolutely perfect for waffle making, I got rid of my old clunky waffle maker and have not looked back. This product is genius, it targets both adults and kids: the cuteness of a “bowl you can eat” for kids and the ability to decorate and eat anything out of this yummy bowls for adults. Super easy to clean and 3.5 minutes to eat and 3.5 minutes to cook each bowl! Buy this is with confidence you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: impulsive buy, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got several of these as "someday gifts" - stocked my gift closet for bridal, wedding and new house parties. I gave three of them away in one summer. Each time I was told "that's soooo cool". Have yet to use it myself, because I am thinking the last one can still be gifted!
customer_reviews.author: JJay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had several accidents when using the products fill line, but ingenious for corn bread ect..
customer_reviews.author: Macglen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golden waffle bowls in 3 minutes. :)
customer_reviews.text: The unit is so easy to operate...just plug it in,close the lid until it clicks (to warm it up), open the lid and pour the batter, close the lid again. After about 3 minutes, you have a nice, golden, delicious waffle bowls you can put anything you want into it. I like that the waffles do not easily stick to the surface (must keep it clean). However, those inner surfaces should be removable to make it easier to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Capo

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Cooks to perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My waffle comes out crispy perfect! Don't think I'll ever eat a freezer waffle again! So many ways to use and Knock-up a meal! Makes awesome waffle bowls..... So fun! Ice cream, fruit, in a waffle bowl, yes please! Peanut butter and jelly sandwich bowl, so good! Apple and grated cheese sandwich bowl, Yummo! Also makes an awesome cornbread bowl to eat your chili in!
customer_reviews.author: jade7

customer_reviews.title: everything in a bowl
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make stuffing bowls for shepherds pie. Huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: takes trial and error, not as easy as expected
customer_reviews.text: It gets too hot for the waffle mix I used. definitely takes trial and error to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead ... Play with your food
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these items because I wanted to share recipies and experiment with these belgium waffle bowl makers with my daughter. We text back and forth our various creations and have so much fun sharing with each other. Gives new meaning to Chicken and Waffles and the desserts are endless. Wonderful product and great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loves this waffle maker and fills the ...
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves this waffle maker and fills the waffles with all kinds of goodies. My brother-in-law then bought two of them for his family
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: A must if you do keto
customer_reviews.text: This unit makes great keto chaffle bowls. Just throw together a serving of chaffle batter and dump it in this waffle bowl maker and a few minutes you got a bready serving bowl for your meal. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: Was purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my brother and sister-in-law. They love it. They have two grand kids whom they have over a lot and can make waffle dishes for sundaes and ice cream bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family LOVE their Death Star waffles. In fact, I made Star Killer Base by only filling the mold halfway. Freeze your leftover waffles and save for ice cream!! You can thank me later!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Rowinsky

customer_reviews.title: It's  ok.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Small, but worked for what it was purchased for after a fair amount of additional time. I couldn't recommend for daily use as it seems that it would not hold up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris msrshall

customer_reviews.title: More than just waffles
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. So easy to use. I gathered friends and demonstrated it. They all loved it. Think beyond just waffles bread bowls cake bowl etc Heats quickly
customer_reviews.author: Bob Perks DJ Bobby P

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Kitchen Gadget
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kitchen gadget - I use it for waffles, wiscuits (use biscuit dough, you'll thank me later) omelets and more. Fast, easy, easy to clean, easy to use. Love this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Enne

customer_reviews.title: Lock broke off on first Use
customer_reviews.text: Overall it was very cool an easy to use. The only thing wrong with it, is that the cover that locks broke off and I barely even touched it. I kinda disappointed because it was the first time I used it too. Even with that it works just fine which is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Big hit on Xmas morning!
customer_reviews.text: I made Belgian waffles for my wife and inlaws on Xmas morning. We filled them with blueberries and strawberries. The waffle iron cooked evenly and they came out fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: splorp!

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING product!!! We have made waffles, cake bowls, and cornbread. All item came out perfect every time, and they did not stick. Would recommend this to everyone who loves belgian waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rau

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!!!!❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This was the must cutest this for breakfast bowls and I haven’t got a chance to make ice cream bowls yet... but it works great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Practice so that you don't overfill
customer_reviews.text: Ok, tbh I've had this half a year and only used it twice, BUT when I used it, it was amaaaazing! It's really non-stick and the waffles turned out amazing! A full bowl is very fulfilling as in I get full eating just the waffle, so I usually just do half a bowl and 2 scrambled eggs :)
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Makes great waffles. My grandkids love to get a waffle bowl for breakfast. Of course, we mix in some chocolate chips!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Hamons

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun making waffle bowls. We like to make them just to eat with butter and syrup or to make bowls for fruit or ice cream. Super easy to clean. Not overly big so storage isn’t a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vasinvictor29

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just love it! You can make a variety of sizes...from small bite size to full size. Can't wait to try different recipes with cake/brownie/cornbread mixes, breads, cookie dough, etc. Might even try tortillas!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Great waffle bowl maker. Perfect for fruit.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of fun with this little waffle maker. I have tried several waffle recipes, including some buckwheat waffles. The cups are perfect filled with fruit or ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: andiesenji

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying using this bowl maker, used with ...
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using this bowl maker , used with yellow cake mix to make strawberry shortcake bowls Perfection !
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Soft Cups on first try
customer_reviews.text: New. I made waffle cups from recipes included. I expected hard yummie waffle cups. They were rather soft and thick. This will take some experimenting on my part to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Non stick peels, good waffles though.
customer_reviews.text: Waffles come out amazing, but the non stick chipping off not even two days in is a little disappointing. The chips sometimes end up on the waffle, but I've seen it and just pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to work with
customer_reviews.text: I love it keep coming up with ideas for the use of it so far it is fun to work with
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Tare

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but you have to time it yourself. Unless you slightly burn it will bot be crispy. Its basically a soft waffle bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Customer

product_meta.title: Presto 03500 Belgian Waffle Bowl Maker,Black
product_meta.description: The Presto Belgian Waffle Bowl Maker is a delightfully different kind of waffle bowl. It makes a 4-inch waffle that's thick, fluffy and tender because it's a real waffle! Fill it with your favorite toppers: butter and syrup or fresh fruit and yogurt. Make hearty breakfasts by filling it with scrambled eggs, ham, sausage, hash browns and more. No special batter is needed. Use store-bought waffle mixes or homemade. Recipes for traditional waffles and more are included. Make breakfast exciting, dessert extraordinary...and take lunch to a new level with chicken waffle tacos. There's endless filling possibilities!.
feature_bullets: Makes a 4-inch waffle that's thick, fluffy and tender because it's a real waffle
Fill with your favorite toppers: butter and syrup, fresh fruit, scrambled eggs, ham, sausage, hash browns and more
No special batter needed; Use store-bought waffle mixes or homemade; Recipes for traditional waffles and more included
Make breakfast exciting, dessert extraordinary and take lunch to a new level with chicken waffle tacos; There's endless filling possibilities
Easy to use; Simply pour in the waffle batter, close the cover and bake; Nonstick grids for easy waffle bowl removal and fast cleanup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,754 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
